name: PaybandCoin
description: Lux Stellar Payband is one of the worldâ€™s first wristbands wallets for making contactless cryptocurrency payments with Stellar Lumens and all Stellar tokens including our custom Payband Coin (PYBC) fueling our events ecosystem.
